snippet.title: [MAME] Snow Board Championship (c)1996-97 Gaelco
snippet.description:
This is Gaelco's Snow Board Championship running in MAME.

The game uses a custom programmed chip as protection device (but not the usual evil battery backed one found on most Galeco games)  This one, like the one found on Squash acts as a decryption device for data written to it.

Charles MacDonald collected 8GB of results from the PCB, the video shown is the result of the game running with that 8GB table loaded into memory, we still need to reduce the table to a set of equations; the device takes 32-bits of data and returns 16.
